ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not according to the GM Admin on Sol Ro and as of today, the undead are still roaming Norrath. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of Brell SCARAB on Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Not according to the GM Admin on Sol Ro and as of today, the undead are
still roaming Norrath.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro

> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > PoH was opened this weekend. That was the reason for all the
> > undead all over the place and the GM events on all the servers
> > - PoH was opened and released hell spawn onto Norrath.
>
> Where did you hear this? The Plane of Hate hasn't been opened
> yet. The surge in undead around the land was for Halloween. You'll
> see things returning to normal now that it's over.
>
